name: Foreningen for Dansk Internet Handel
goal: FDIH skal fremme og styrke den danske distance- og internethandel både nationalt som internationalt.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Fraud prevention, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
Digital Single Market
GDPR
E-Privacy legislation
Cross Border E-commerce
PSD2
TRaxation of Digital Business
